our models.from sentence: We test our models on Stanford Question Answering Dataset ( SQuAD ) .

SQuAD dataset.from sentence: The SQuAD dataset consists of more than 100,000 questions annotated by crowdsourcing workers on a selected set of Wikipedia articles , and the answer to each question is a span of text in the Wikipedia articles .

Out - of - vocabulary ( OOV ) words.from sentence: Out - of - vocabulary ( OOV ) words are initialized randomly with Gaussian samples .

CharCNN filter length.from sentence: CharCNN filter length is 1 , 3 , 5 , each is 50 dimensions .

cluster number K.from sentence: The cluster number K in discriminative block is 100 .

used for.from sentence: The Adam method is used for optimization .

second.from sentence: And the first momentum is set to be 0.9 and the second 0.999 .

batch size.from sentence: The initial learning rate is 0.0004 and the batch size is 32 .

word - level embedding d w.from sentence: All hidden states of GRUs , and TreeLSTMs are 500 dimensions , while word - level embedding d w is 300 dimensions .

Explicit question - type dimension d ET.from sentence: Explicit question - type dimension d ET is 50 .

pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors.from sentence: We use pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors to initialize our word embeddings .

max length.from sentence: We set max length of document to 500 , and drop the question - document pairs beyond this on training set .

dropout.from sentence: We apply dropout to the Encoder layer and aggregation layer with a dropout rate of 0.5 .
